import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo', templateUrl: './todo.component.html' }) export class TodoComponent implements OnInit { public todos: any[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.http.get('/api/todo').subscribe(result => { this.todos = result; }); } }
